titles.title: A bill for the relief of Wayne Greenfield.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 3/4/1987--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named individual in full satisfaction of all claims against the United States arising from a survey by the Bureau of Land Management.
